Endosulfan, alpha.Definition: Organic Compound;Pesticide;Organochloride; Endosulfan, Alpha is the stabler of two stereoisomers of endosulfan. Endosulfan is a organochlorine insecticide and acaricide. It is used to control insects on food and non-food crops and also as a wood preservative. Due to its toxicity and tendency to bioaccumulate, the use of endosulfan is banned in many areas.
